mapper.select: SELECT r.ROLE_NAME FROM EMPLOYEES u INNER JOIN ROLES r ON u.ROLE_ID = r.ROLE_ID WHERE u.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT p.PERM_ID AS MENU_PATH, p.PERM_NAME AS MENU_NAME, p.PERM_DESCRIPTION AS MENU_DESCRIPTION, p.ICON AS MENU_ICON, p.PARENT_TO AS PARENT_MENU_PATH FROM PERMISSIONS p WHERE p.PERM_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT rp.PERM_ID FROM ROLE_PERMISSION rp INNER JOIN EMPLOYEES e ON rp.ROLE_ID = e.ROLE_ID WHERE e.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{userId} AND e.STATUS = '050001' ) ORDER BY CASE WHEN p.PARENT_TO IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, p.PERM_ID
